SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Name: Get Site List XML
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Author: Nolan Regenwether
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.CreateProcedureSQL: create procedure dbo.USR_USP_GETSITELISTXML ( @SITELIST xml = null output ) as begin SELECT @SITELIST = (SELECT ID, NAME as SITENAME, CAST(0 as bit) SELECTED FROM ( SELECT TOP 100 PERCENT ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( ORDER BY NAME ASC) + 1 as rownum, ID, NAME FROM dbo.SITE ORDER BY NAME ASC ) sns ORDER BY rownum asc FOR XML PATH('Item'), ROOT('SITELIST') ) end
